Text: Thanks man, fuck the scene and their stupid mp4s

Here's the really curious thing.

Most of the professionals (you know, media network types) do in fact use x264/AAC
But they've all stopped using MP4. They put x264/AAC in an FLV container.
Sometimes they put x264/AAC in a MOV container. But NEVER MP4 any more.

But only "Scene" TV is now in MP4.
Movie & TV DVD rips are all XVID (or MKV).

And fewer of the RGs of "The Scene" are doing MP4, most do only a minimum.
Which leaves LOL to do the bulk of this "BetaMax" format.

And there are nearing a dozen new entries for XVID posting.

AVIGUY

For me,Avis are perfect.
Unfortunately,mkvs demand too much and I usually have problems with them.
Thank you very much for the Avis.
Please,keep them coming.
